main event: A person sighted a bright white, round object that hovered and maneuvered silently for several minutes before suddenly accelerating and disappearing near the Granville gate on the north end of an airport.
interesting points: The object was slightly larger than a car in size and silver in color.
The object made no sound during the sighting.
The object did not resemble any conventional aircraft or known object.
The incident left the witness and other observers very confused and unsure of what they had observed.
The sighting occurred at a distance of about one mile from the observers.
location: near the Granville gate on the north end of an airport
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
